synopsis.p: Matt Phillips and Chris Reuter will be presenting tonight.

talk.speaker: Chris Reuter
talk.title: DECK and an Introduction to Smalltalk

description.p: This frist talk describes Deck, a small experimental programming language. I will describe the language and some of the reasoning behind its design, as well as the details of its implementation in Perl.
The second talk will be a brief introduction to Smalltalk.
